text:
hi i am relatively new and sorry if iam asking something dumb
i have custom module, is there anyway i can print the variable in the custom module outside of the custom module
for example the module inputs dates(event duration ) and links(external) to various events
and i want to print those dates on my post page of my blog for the respective events

i did try to directly print the variable and snippet but it didnt work.
thanks in advance
Yea you can, need to access via the content dict and there is a widget_data dict in there I think. Let me find a reference
sigh can't find it, this is the closest: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/widget-data-value-in-blog-listing/td-p/168192>
Use the pprint filter on content to track down the module fields you want
Common question, I'll try write a detailed answer on it in the near future
